content: *all my designs are free to download if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to your local humane society or animal care organization * *asymmetric* triangle scarf in garter and open work stitches two plain and one open work edge you ll need 250 meters of dk yarn and 4 5mm needles you may knit this pattern in almost any weight yarn and needles start scarf at one end and stop when you reach desired length great stash buster please note this is an asymmetrical triangle scarf obtuse triangle pattern information number of pages 2 language s english instructions written sizes variable photos 2
